title: I am being sued by CACH LLC. They are represented by Mandarich law group. The case is in Chatsworth CA Superior Court.
question: My trial date is 3-2015. Mandarich claims through paperwork that last payment was 10-2010. No evidence has been presented. I would like to have a lawyer to represent me to obtain evidence. Mandarich lawyers have never made any contact with me.
answers: Based on facts stated, you were likely served summons and complaint. Consult BK and debt collection defense counsel.
We cannot directly solicit clients on Avvo. You can search Avvo and contact a lawyer yourself.

Agreed, you have to take the step to get a lawyer. Use the feature above to find one in your area. I bet Mandarich has contacted you, I bet they served you a summons and discovery. Did you answer that?
Other than that, they dont need to your adverse to them.
